00029 {

00031     lb = lb_;
00032     ub = ub_;

00039 // qp_as
00040 
00050 qp_as::qp_as(
00051         const int N_, 
00052         const double Alpha, 
00053         const double Beta, 
00054         const double Gamma, 
00055         const double regularization, 
00056         const double tol_) : 
00057     qp_solver (N_, Alpha, Beta, Gamma, regularization, tol_),
00058     chol (N_)
00059 {
00060     iHg = new double[2*N];
00061 
00062     // there are no inequality constraints in the initial working set (no hot-starting for the moment)
00063     W = new int[2*N];
00064 #ifdef QPAS_DOWNDATE
00065     W_sign = new int[2*N];
00066 #endif
00067 
00068     Bounds.resize(2*N);
00069 }

00079         delete iHg;
00080

00082     if (W_sign != NULL)
00083         delete W_sign;
00084 #endif
00085 }

00098 void qp_as::set_parameters(
00099         const double* T_, 
00100         const double* h_, 
00101         const double* angle,
00102         const double* zref_x,
00103         const double* zref_y,
00104         const double* lb,
00105         const double* ub)
00106 {
00107     nW = 0;
00108 
00109     set_state_parameters (T_, h_, angle);
00110     form_iHg (zref_x, zref_y);
00111     form_bounds(lb, ub);
00112 }

00115 
00122 void qp_as::form_iHg(const double *zref_x, const double *zref_y)
00123 {
00124     double p0, p1;
00125     double cosA, sinA;
00126 
00127     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
00128     {
00129         cosA = spar[i].cos;
00130         sinA = spar[i].sin;
00131 
00132         // zref
00133         p0 = zref_x[i];
00134         p1 = zref_y[i];
00135 
00136         // inv (2*H) * R' * Cp' * zref
00137         iHg[i*2] =     -i2Q[0] * (cosA*p0 + sinA*p1)*gain_beta;
00138         iHg[i*2 + 1] = -i2Q[0] * (-sinA*p0 + cosA*p1)*gain_beta; 
00139     }
00140 }

00150 void qp_as::form_bounds(const double *lb, const double *ub)
00151 {
00152     for (int i=0; i < N; i++)
00153     {
00154         Bounds[i*2].set(NUM_STATE_VAR*i, lb[i*2], ub[i*2], false);
00155         Bounds[i*2+1].set(NUM_STATE_VAR*i+3, lb[i*2+1], ub[i*2+1], false);
00156     }
00157 }

00160 
00166 int qp_as::check_blocking_bounds()
00167 {
00168     alpha = 1;
00169 
00170     /* Index to include in the working set, -1 if no constraint have to be included. */
00171     int activated_var_num = -1;
00172 
00173 
00174     for (int i = 0; i < 2*N; i++)
00175     {
00176         // Check only inactive constraints for violation. 
00177         // The constraints in the working set will not be violated regardless of 
00178         // the depth of descent
00179         if (!Bounds[i].isActive)
00180         {
00181             int ind = Bounds[i].var_num;
00182 #ifdef QPAS_DOWNDATE
00183             int sign = 1;
00184 #endif
00185             double t = 1;
00186 
00187             if ( dX[ind] < -tol )
00188             {
00189                 t = (Bounds[i].lb - X[ind])/dX[ind];
00190 #ifdef QPAS_DOWNDATE
00191                 sign = -1;
00192 #endif
00193             }
00194             else if ( dX[ind] > tol ) 
00195             {
00196                 t = (Bounds[i].ub - X[ind])/dX[ind];
00197             }
00198 
00199             if (t < alpha)
00200             {
00201                 alpha = t;
00202                 activated_var_num = i;
00203 #ifdef QPAS_DOWNDATE
00204                 W_sign[nW] = sign;
00205 #endif
00206             }
00207         }
00208     }
00209     if (activated_var_num != -1)
00210     {
00211         W[nW] = activated_var_num;    
00212         nW++;
00213         Bounds[activated_var_num].isActive = true;
00214     }
00215 
00216     return (activated_var_num);
00217 }  
00218 
00219 
00220 #ifdef QPAS_DOWNDATE
00221 
00234 int qp_as::choose_excl_constr (const double *lambda)
00235 {
00236     double min_lambda = -tol;
00237     int ind_exclude = -1;
00238 
00239     // find the constraint with the smallest lambda
00240     for (int i = 0; i < nW; i++)
00241     {
00242         if (lambda[i] * W_sign[i] < min_lambda)
00243         {
00244             min_lambda = lambda[i] * W_sign[i];
00245             ind_exclude = i;
00246         }
00247     }
00248 
00249     if (ind_exclude != -1)
00250     {
00251         Bounds[W[ind_exclude]].isActive = false;
00252         for (int i = ind_exclude; i < nW-1; i++)
00253         {
00254             W[i] = W[i + 1];
00255             W_sign[i] = W_sign[i + 1];
00256         }
00257         nW--;
00258     }
00259 
00260     return (ind_exclude);
00261 }
00262 #endif /* QPAS_DOWNDATE */
00263 
00264 
00270 int qp_as::solve ()
00271 {
00272     // obtain dX
00273     chol.solve(this, iHg, X, dX);
00274 
00275     for (;;)
00276     {
00277         int activated_var_num = check_blocking_bounds();
00278 
00279         // Move in the feasible descent direction
00280         for (int i = 0; i < N*NUM_VAR ; i++)
00281         {
00282             X[i] += alpha * dX[i];
00283         }
00284 
00285         // no new inequality constraints
00286         if (activated_var_num == -1)
00287         {
00288 #ifdef QPAS_DOWNDATE
00289             int ind_exclude = choose_excl_constr (chol.get_lambda(this));
00290             if (ind_exclude != -1)
00291             {
00292                 chol.down_resolve (this, iHg, nW, W, ind_exclude, X, dX);
00293             }
00294             else
00295             {
00296                 break;
00297             }
00298 #else
00299             break;
00300 #endif /*QPAS_DOWNDATE*/
00301         }
00302         else
00303         {
00304             // add row to the L matrix and find new dX
00305             chol.up_resolve (this, iHg, nW, W, X, dX);
00306         }
00307     }
00308 
00309     return (nW);
00310 }
